title: I, Regress (BBC radio comedy) (Matt Berry)
description:
I, Regress

Synopsis:

Matt Berry plays a twisted regression therapist, who takes his patients on a surreal and unsettling journey into their unsuspecting sub-conscious.

Each episode sees the doctor dealing with a different client. As the patient is put under hypnosis, we 'enter' their mind, and all the various situations the hypnotherapist takes them through are played out for us to hear.

The series shows that the cure can sometimes be worse than the disease.

(from http://www.comedy.co.uk/guide/radio/i_regress/)


Technical:

This was recorded from the BBC iPlayer using rtmpdump, and cut using avconv 0.8.10, using the following commands:

avconv -ss 101.3 -i b018xs90.flv -codec copy -t 00:13:59 1.m4a
avconv -ss 127.2 -i b0194n33.flv -codec copy             2.m4a
avconv -ss 121   -i b019fxbc.flv -codec copy             3.m4a
avconv -ss 7.7   -i b019rqcx.flv -codec copy -t 00:13:58 4.m4a
avconv -ss 108   -i b01bb70f.flv -codec copy -t 00:13:56 5.m4a
